message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GR 

This paper proposes an end-to-end model for 3D indoor scene understanding using a single RGB image. The paper focuses on jointly recovering object bounding boxes, room layout, and camera pose in 3D. This problem is related to computer vision (cs.CV) as it involves object detection and layout estimation. Additionally, the paper proposes a cooperative training approach that involves multiple modules, which is related to robotics (cs.RO) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also uses parametrization to improve prediction, which is related to machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper deals with geometrically consistent and physically plausible 3D scene estimation, which is related to graphics (cs.GR).
